title: mailman.start
body:
<<if $spoken_to_jock == 0>>
    JACQUES: BRO, check out my sweet POWER MOVE
    JACQUES: oh you're new here?! i'm the ALPHA BOY
    JACQUES: i'm fresh out of COMMUNITY COLLEGE and ready to PUMP SOME IRON
    <<set $spoken_to_jock to 1>>
<<endif>>
<<if $jock_talked_to_today is 1>>
    JACQUES: busy working out, CHECK ME OUT TOMORROW when i lift my GAME DESIGN DEGREE
    <<stop>>
<<else>>
    <<if $jock_day is 0>>
        JACQUES: BRO, got something for me to lift?
        [[lift me!|jock.liftme]][[plenty of air around|jock.air]]
    <<elseif $jock_day is 1>>
        JACQUES: come back to touch my muscles?
        JACQUES: i would too
        JACQUES: i really liked our REAL TALK yesterday
        JACQUES: i think you can hang
        [[high five!|jock.hanghigh]][[let's fist bump|jock.hangfist]]
    <<elseif $jock_day is 2>>
        <<if $jock_started_quest is 0>>
            JACQUES: hey BRO did you bring any controllers?
            JACQUES: i'd let you play my SUPER CRIMBENDO but MUSICIAN has my SWERVEBIRD controller
            JACQUES: yo BRO would you go get my controller for me?
            [[sure|jock.startquest]][[maybe not...|jock.noquest]]
        <<else>>
            <<if $jock_ended_quest is 0>>
                JACQUES: did you get my controller back from MUSICIAN??
                JACQUES: WHAT? you didn't?
                JACQUES: BRO come back to me when you got my controller
                JACQUES: REMEMBER... MUSICIAN has my CONTROLLER
                <<stop>>
            <<elseif $jock_ended_quest is 1>>
                JACQUES: BRO you got my controller????
                JACQUES: this is great!
                JACQUES: hey BRO can i come inside and play SUPER CRIMBENDO?
                JACQUES: i'll get cozy inside of you and LIFT WEIGHTS!
                <<addlove CurrentTarget>>
            <<endif>>
        <<endif>>
    <<endif>>
<<endif>>

title: mailman.liftme
body:
JACQUES: wow you'd really let me do that???
JACQUES: you don't want me to lift you
JACQUES: you'd go too high and get SCARED
JACQUES: just so you know i can lift like 100 of you
JACQUES: you barely weigh as much as my diploma
[[i don't believe|jock.dontbelieve]][[you're so COOL|jock.socool]]

title: mailman.dontbelieve
body:
JACQUES: yeah? well you should check out my TROPHIES one day
JACQUES: TROPHIES for all the weights i lifted in game design class
JACQUES: i could easily lift the entire PROGRAMMING TEAM
JACQUES: i'll see you tomorrow, BRO
<<set $jock_talked_to_today to 1>>

title: mailman.socool
body:
JACQUES: thanks BRO, i don't work out every day to be a DWEEB
JACQUES: prove to me you're not a dweeb. how much can you bench???
[[50 pounds|jock.wrongweight]][[419 pounds|jock.wrongweight]][[1000 pounds|jock.rightweight]]

title: mailman.wrongweight
body:
JACQUES: wow, sounds like you need to hit the GYM sometime
JACQUES: maybe we can be GYM BUDDIES
JACQUES: SYKE come see me when you can bench at least 1000 pounds!!
<<set $jock_talked_to_today to 1>>

title: mailman.rightweight
body:
JACQUES: wow 1000 huh?
JACQUES: you're pretty close to me, except i can bench A MILLION
JACQUES: that's okay you're off to a good start
JACQUES: i really enjoyed talking to you today
JACQUES: come back tomorrow and we can COMPARE MUSCLES
<<addlove CurrentTarget>>
<<set $jock_day to 1>>
<<set $jock_talked_to_today to 1>>

title: mailman.air
body:
JACQUES: AIR?!?!
JACQUES: BRO i can lift at least a billion more pounds of air than you
JACQUES: come back tomorrow and i'll lift the world's largest JAR OF AIR
<<set $jock_talked_to_today to 1>>

title: mailman.hanghigh
body:
JACQUES: what? a high five?
JACQUES: BRO how lame can you GET?
JACQUES: wow this really bums me out
JACQUES: just come and talk to me tomorrow, i need to lift something to get all this LAME out of my system
<<set $jock_talked_to_today to 1>>

title: mailman.hangfist
body:
JACQUES: AW YEAH BRO YOU GOT IT
JACQUES: that was SICK
JACQUES: BRO, that got me so pumped it's time for a POP QUIZ
JACQUES: READY? this won't be EASY
JACQUES: how many pounds can i lift?
[[2000, next!|jock.quizwrong]][[that's easy, a BILLION|jock.quizparttwo]][[no brainer, 149,291|jock.quizwrong]]

title: mailman.quizwrong
body:
JACQUES: WRONG
JACQUES: sounds like you need to work on your MENTAL muscles as much as your MUSCLE muscles
JACQUES: see me tomorrow when you've curled a few BOOKS
<<set $jock_talked_to_today to 1>>

title: mailman.quizparttwo
body:
JACQUES: ROUND TWO
JACQUES: how big are my muscles?
[[10 inches?|jock.wrongquiz]][[28 inches?|jock.quizpartthree]][[a billion?|jock.wrongquiz2]]

title: mailman.wrongquiz2
body:
JACQUES: HAH
JACQUES: i WISH!
JACQUES: try again TOMORROW
<<set $jock_talked_to_today to 1>>

title: mailman.quizpartthree
body:
JACQUES: WOW you're really IMPRESSING ME
JACQUES: are you ready for your LAST ONE?
JACQUES: what school is my GAME DESIGN DEGREE from?
[[swoleland college|jock.quizwrong]][[west protein university|jock.quizwrong]][[fullgains university |jock.finishquiz]]

title: mailman.finishquiz
body:
JACQUES: that's right! the one and only FULLGAINS UNIVERSITY
JACQUES: that's where the best and brightest learn to PLAY GAMES for a living
JACQUES: i have a bachelor's in SPEED RUNNING
JACQUES: stop by tomorrow and i'll show you my SICK STRATS
JACQUES: i can't wait to see you again!
<<addlove CurrentTarget>>
<<set $jock_day to 2>>
<<set $jock_talked_to_today to 1>>

title: mailman.startquest
body:
JACQUES: really BRO?
JACQUES: i think we're on a fast track to be BEST FRIENDS
JACQUES: heck, maybe i'll even move in to you!
JACQUES: REMEMBER... MUSICIAN has my CONTROLLER
<<set $jock_started_quest to 1>>
<<set $jock_ended_quest to 1>>

title: mailman.noquest
body: JACQUES: let me know when you want to do a BRO a favor
